input: Country: Poland. Purchaser Name: PROVINCIAL HOSPITAL CENTER OF THE JELENIA GORA VALLEY. Summary: Delivery and Launch of Solutions Enabling Physical Segmentation of Servers and Edge Devices. Description: The subject of the order is the delivery and launch of solutions enabling the physical segmentation of servers for the Provincial Hospital Center of the Jelenia Gora Valley in Jelenia Gora, in accordance with Annex No. 1 to the SWZ - Description of the Subject of the Order. The subject of the order includes design together with the installation, delivery and commissioning of solutions enabling the physical segmentation of servers and edge devices in order to increase the security and efficiency of the network and server infrastructure. The designed solution is intended to provide physical segmentation allowing for isolation critical IT resources, which minimizes the risk of spreading potential cyber threats and limits unauthorized users' access to sensitive data. In order to implement the physical segmentation of servers and edge devices, the Ordering Party allows the preparation of a second one server room in a container building. The final date for completion of deliveries and order fulfillment cannot be later than May 15, 2026.<br> Delivery and launch of solutions enabling physical segmentation of servers<br> and edge devices<br> Doc Title: Delivery and launch of enabling solutions physical segmentation of servers and edge devices<br> Contract Type: supplies. input: Country: Poland. Purchaser Name: THE MUNICIPALITY OF PŁOŃSK REPRESENTED BY THE MAYOR OF PŁOŃSK. Summary: Revitalization of the Constitution Park of the 3Rd of May as Part of the Task Entitled: Adaptation of Green and Blue Infrastructure in Płońsk to Climate Change.. Description: Subject of the order:<br> The subject of the public procurement is a service consisting in the development of greenery in an existing park by increasing its biodiversity with a large number of new plantings, including native species and flowering and turf vegetation, conservation of old trees and unsealing asphalt surfaces in the form of alleys and replacing them with mineral and gravel alleys along with equipping the area with small architecture, as part of the task entitled: "Adaptation of the green and blue infrastructure in Płońsk to climate change."<br> Revitalization of Constitution Park 3 Maja with an area of 7,200 m2 (plot no. 754, precinct 217, Płońsk city) includes:<br> 1) carrying out specialist maintenance works in existing old trees, including carrying out a dendrological examination,<br> 2) introduction of new plantings of trees, shrubs, perennials and cover plants,<br> 3) sowing lawns,<br> 4)removing the asphalt from the alleys and creating a permeable mineral and gravel surface such as a stone carpet,<br> 5) disassembly of used concrete benches and baskets,<br> 6) equipping the area with small architecture (benches, baskets, chess tables and seats, pergolas for vines and solar-hybrid lamps).<br> On the task in question The Płońsk City Commune obtained funding under the call for proposals no.: FENX.02.04-IW.01-002/23, Measure FENX.02.04 Adaptation to climate change, prevention of disasters, Project type: Support for sustainable rainwater management systems involving aim.... Published Date: 2025-11-07. Closing Date: 2025-11-17. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

input: Country: Poland. Purchaser Name: BARLINEK FOREST DISTRICT. Summary: Reconstruction of the Regular Exit from Provincial Road 151 to the Registration Plot 271/1, Okunie District. Description: Reconstruction of the regular exit from provincial road 151 into registration plot 271/1, Okunie district. The width of the planned exit road is 6.0 m. The exit road is framed with a concrete curb measuring 15x30x100cm and a concrete retainer 15x30x100cm. The curbs and stops are placed on a concrete bench with a stop. Grade concrete min. 15.0MPa. A 75 cm wide hardened shoulder will be constructed along the exit road from the green area. Hardening gr. 15 cm made of mechanically stabilized crushed aggregate, fraction 0-31.5 mm. Mechanically stabilized aggregate. The exit surface will be made of red concrete cubes. 12cm (double T). Place the cubes on a cement-sand ballast (1:3) thick. 15 cm and a substructure of solid rock masonry - use masonry with a fraction of 0-63 mm (layer thickness 25 cm). Make a layer under the fattening by cutting off the top layer of fine-grained sand. 15cm. The slope along the slope is adapted to the terrain the field.. Published Date: 2025-11-07. Closing Date: 2025-11-21. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

output.Summary: Reconstruction of the Regular Exit from Provincial Road 151 to the Registration Plot 271/1, Okunie District

input: Country: Poland. Purchaser Name: COMMUNE OF NIEMCE. Summary: Construction of a Sanitary Sewage System in the Town of Niemka from Ul. Orzechowa to Boduszyn. Description: The subject of the order is the implementation of the next stage of the construction of a sanitary sewage system in the towns of Niemce and Boduszyn, consisting in the construction of a sanitary sewage system on the section from ul. Orzechowa in Germany to the town of Boduszyn. The scope of work includes the construction of a section of the sanitary sewage system from the existing SR4 well, located at ul. Orzechowa in the town of Niemce, at plot no. 2035/16 (precinct no. 17 Niemce), towards the town of Boduszyn, until the end of development of plot no. 91 (precinct no. 2 Boduszyn). The detailed course of the designed network is shown in the executive drawing, Appendix No. 12 to SWZ.. Published Date: 2025-11-07. Closing Date: 2025-11-21. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

input: Country: Poland. Purchaser Name: PROVINCIAL ROADS AUTHORITY IN KATOWICE. Summary: Ongoing Maintenance and Repairs of Structural Elements, Drainage, Equipment and Traffic Safety Devices on Engineering Facilities during the Provincial Road Network of the Silesian Voivodeship. Description: This task includes the replacement of damaged equipment elements in engineering facilities; cleaning of culverts, collectors and drainage channels of bridge structures; cleaning drainage ditches within engineering structures and ensuring the integrity of culverts; repairs and protection anti-corrosion of concrete and steel surfaces of structural elements and equipment of engineering facilities; repairing and filling local losses in concrete of structural elements, together with securing and supplementing reinforced concrete bars; repairs of local defects in the bituminous road surface bridge structures; replacement and repair of damaged bituminous expansion joints in the road at the junction with bridge structures. The details of the task are described in the Description of the Subject of the Order, Bill of Quantities and documents orders. Published Date: 2025-11-07. Closing Date: 2025-11-26. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

Szkolna 5, 46-034 Room for a civil defense warehouse co-financed from the budget of the Opole Voivodeship. The scope of the planned investment includes: 1. Description: The ordering party informs that the order is not divided into parts. The reasons for not dividing the contract are: inability to effectively coordinate the activities of different contractors implementing individual parts of the contract, which would seriously jeopardize the proper execution of the work, excessive technical difficulties resulting from the specific nature of the contract. work carried out, increase in investment costs. The lack of such a division also regulates performance and warranty liability. The introduction of a larger number of potential contractors will disturb the implementation of the construction and investment process, increase the investment cost and also make it impossible to take responsibility for the entire facility by one Contractor. The subject of the order is the construction of a sanitary sewage system in the network of Growo Kruzy Tejstymy commune. Kolno STAGE II KRUZA. input: Country: Poland. Purchaser Name: PRUCHNIK COMMUNE. Summary: Removal and Management of Municipal Sewage Sludge from the Sewage Treatment Plant in Pruchnik. Description: The subject of the order is the removal and management of municipal sewage sludge from the sewage treatment plant in Pruchnik in 2026. The service of removal of stabilized municipal sewage sludge with code 190805 from the sewage treatment plant located in Pruchnik to the place of its management and processing (from excluding recovery using the R10 method) should be carried out in a continuous handling system according to the export notification agreed with the Ordering Party, with the frequency adjusted to the amount of their accumulation in containers. The estimated amount of waste with code 190805 per year is approximately 716 Mg (average from the last three years) with hydration approx. 13% DM Details are included in, among others: Chapter III SWZ.. input: Country: Poland. Purchaser Name: POLIN MUSEUM OF THE HISTORY OF POLISH JEWS. Summary: Modernization of Part of the Passive Infrastructure and the Entire Infrastructure of the Active Ict Network. Description: 1. The subject of the order is the modernization of part of the passive infrastructure and the entire active infrastructure of the ICT network at the POLIN Museum of the History of Polish Jews in Warsaw. Modernization works will cover the entire building. They will mainly consist in the implementation of a telecommunications installation, and will include: laying out structured cabling, building new service cabinets including IT equipment, including cabling, creating new WIFI access points on the walls and ceilings (therefore, local demolition of ceilings will be necessary) and making new sockets connection points, which results in the need to cut out local walls and dismantle and then reconstruct fire penetrations. To lay out the cables, it will also be necessary to create new fire protection bushings and new cable routes. The activity includes the performance of such works as: drilling holes, furrowing walls, demolition of ceilings, demolition of fire passages, reconstruction of walls by local filling, painting, reconstruction of ceilings, construction of new fire passages, permanent installation of new steel routes .... Published Date: 2025-11-07. Closing Date: 2025-12-12. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

input: Country: Poland. Purchaser Name: MALCZYCE COMMUNE. Summary: Construction of a Water Supply Network at Stocznia Street in Malczyce. Description: Type of order: construction work. The subject of the order is: execution in the design and build mode of a task called: Construction of a water supply network at Stocznia Street in Malczyce. Brief description of the task: Construction of a water supply network running along Stocznia Street (no. 104825D) in Malczyce from Mickiewicza Street (plot no. 272dr) to the planned hydrant (plot no. 200/2) with a total length of 806 m divided into three sections. Section 1 - transit with a diameter of 125 mm from the existing network on plot no. 272 ​​with a diameter of 225 mm to the bridge over the Redzka Woda river. The network should be constructed using the open excavation method using PE-HD PN10 pipes - long section 705 m. Section 2 - suspension of the water supply network to the bridge structure - the network section should be made of pipes with a diameter of 125 mm, pre-insulated with network polyethylene PE 100, an insulating layer made of PE foam and a casing pipe made of PEHD polyethylene - section length 60 m. Section 3 - transit with a diameter of 125 mm from the bridge through plot no. 214 to the planned hydrant on plot no. 200/2. The hanging should be made using PE-HD PN10 pipes using the open excavation method - 41 m long. The works assume replacement of the soil and removal of excavated material at a distance of 1akm .... Published Date: 2025-11-07. Closing Date: 2025-11-21. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

input: Country: Poland. Purchaser Name: AGH UNIVERSITY OF SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY STANISŁAW STASZIC IN KRAKOW. Summary: Renovation of the Ventilation System in the Building of the Ds9 "Omega" Student Dormitory Budryka 9 in Krakow Kc-De-Zp.272-667/25. Description: The DS9 Omega student dormitory building is a 5-story building with a partial basement. It is a structure with a frame, brick, traditional structure. The facility currently has a brick gravity duct ventilation system. Air supply takes place through window infiltration with duct exhaust in sanitary sewage rooms and auxiliary rooms. Due to the measurements of ventilation effectiveness, which did not meet the required performance parameters, a system was designed to support the gravity system by installing VBP chimney caps - which created the so-called system hybrid ventilation. The hybrid ventilation system will consist of the following elements: - a low-pressure chimney cowl for several ventilation stations with an air efficiency range of 0 - 400 m3/h, - a connection stub for the cowl mounted on the chimney cap. The power supply will be through regulators for powering attachments transforming the electrical power from 230V / 12V DC. An independent regulator for each chimney cowl. The regulator allows you to change the operating parameters of the root. The regulator will have an operating status indicator, i.e. green d.... Published Date: 2025-11-07. Closing Date: 2025-11-24. The scope of the subject of the order includes the provision of the service of running a shelter for homeless animals by the Contractor to the Ordering Party. originating from the Grudzidz Commune, transport of free-living animals requiring veterinary care or veterinary procedures to appropriate centers, and collection, transport and disposal of dead animals from the Grudzidz Commune. 3. The Contractor's obligations include in particular: 1) recovery, transport to the shelter and providing care in the shelter for homeless animals from the Grudzidz Commune, 2) rehoming free-roaming animals requiring veterinary care or veterinary procedures from the Grudzidz Commune, 3) transporting animals to the designated animal rehabilitation center by the Ordering Party. Published Date: 2025-11-07. Closing Date: 2025-11-17. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

As part of the investment, the facility will be enlarged by 6 m towards the west over its entire width, at maintaining the current ridge height. The expanded fire station building will serve as a service facility. On the ground floor there is a garage area and technical and sanitary facilities. Winter road maintenance includes activities aimed at ensuring passability and limiting disruptions to the flow of road traffic caused by phenomena such as rainfall snow, sleet, freezing drizzle or slippery winter roads. Description: 1.The subject of the order is:<br> Providing services related to winter maintenance of sidewalks and bicycle paths during the winter road maintenance season: 2025/2026, i.e. combating slipperiness and snow removal.<br> Task No. 1: Combating slipperiness and clearing snow from sidewalks and bicycle paths along roads voivodeships from the disposal point - the headquarters of the Provincial Roads District in Hrubieszow, along with the management of excess snow on our own in accordance with the bill of quantities and location of services in the planned number of hours 237.<br> Task No. 2: Combating slipperiness and clearing snow from sidewalks and bicycle paths on provincial roads from the disposal point - the headquarters of the Road District in Tyszowce, along with the management of excess snow on our own in accordance with the bill of quantities and location of services in the planned number of hours 237.<br> 2. The order includes mechanical and manual snow removal and control slipperiness of winter surfaces of sidewalks, pedestrian and bicycle paths, stop platforms with access to pedestrian crossings according to the places included in Annex G, detailing the location of places for snow removal and elimination of winter slipperiness on sidewalks in the winter season 2025/2026 with using roughening materials, i.e. sand-salt mixture and salt.<br> 3. For tasks 1 and 2, the Ordering Party reserves the following rights:<br> 1) The Ordering Party reserves the right to reduce the scope of the order and change the maximum number of contracted hours according to the actual needs resulting from the prevailing conditions. warun.... input: Country: Poland. Purchaser Name: BURZENIN COMMUNE. Summary: Collection and Management of Municipal Waste from the Burzenin Commune. Description: The subject of the order is a service consisting in the collection and management of municipal waste from the Burzenin commune and equipping all property owners with waste containers or bags. The scope of the order applies to residential properties and properties with cottages holiday homes or other properties used for recreational purposes. The municipal waste collection system does not cover waste generated as a result of running a business. The service will be provided in the period from signing the contract to December 31, 2027, with acceptance and waste management would be carried out from January 1, 2026 to December 31, 2027. Removal should be carried out by shoveling snow to the edge of the road or parking lot in such a way that the shoveled snow does not impede pedestrian or vehicle traffic. In the event of black ice, the Contractor, in addition to the above-mentioned activities, will additionally roughen the surface by sprinkling the surface drg sand with salt. input: Country: Poland. Purchaser Name: GODOW COMMUNE. Summary: Construction of Asphalt Overlays on Municipal Roads. Description: The subject of the order is the performance of construction works consisting in the renovation of bituminous surfaces by making asphalt overlays on sections of municipal roads indicated by the Ordering Party in the Godw Commune. Road width from 3 to 5 m with regulation of manholes. Scope of the order includes in particular:1. Preparation of the area by milling the surface - approx. 990 m2;2. Cleaning and sprinkling the existing surface with asphalt emulsion with an area of ​​approx. 3,300 m2;3. Profiling and leveling the existing surface with a mineral-asphalt mixture (leveling layer in places of collapses or ruts);4. Construction of an asphalt overlay made of asphalt concrete (AC 11S), 4 cm thick, area - approx. 3,300 m2;5. Completing and adjusting the height of wells, valves, street inlets and other underground infrastructure devices - approximately 22 pieces;6. Tidying up the area after completion of the work. A detailed description of the subject of the order can be found in Appendix No. 1 to the SWZ. It consists of the following documents: 1) bill of quantities, 2) detailed technical specification (STT).. Published Date: 2025-11-06. Closing Date: 2025-11-21. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

output.Summary: Construction of Asphalt Overlays on Municipal Roads
output.Description: The subject of the order is the performance of construction works consisting in the renovation of bituminous surfaces by making asphalt overlays on sections of municipal roads indicated by the Ordering Party in the Godw Commune. Road width from 3 to 5 m with regulation of manholes. Scope of the order includes in particular:1. Preparation of the area by milling the surface - approx. 990 m2;2. Cleaning and sprinkling the existing surface with asphalt emulsion with an area of ​​approx. 3,300 m2;3. Profiling and leveling the existing surface with a mineral-asphalt mixture (leveling layer in places of collapses or ruts);4. Construction of an asphalt overlay made of asphalt concrete (AC 11S), 4 cm thick, area - approx. 3,300 m2;5. Completing and adjusting the height of wells, valves, street inlets and other underground infrastructure devices - approximately 22 pieces;6. Tidying up the area after completion of the work. A detailed description of the subject of the order can be found in Appendix No. 1 to the SWZ. It consists of the following documents: 1) bill of quantities, 2) detailed technical specification (STT).

Summary: Conducting Ongoing Maintenance and Repairs of the Measurement System Located on Roads Managed by the Gddkia Branch in Lublin, Along with Providing Data, over a Period of 18 Months.. Description: The subject of the contract is the ongoing maintenance and repairs of the measurement system located on roads managed by GDDKiA Branch in Lublin, including the provision of data, over a period of 18 months. Comprehensive ongoing maintenance of the measurement system includes activities enabling for uninterrupted operation of the system in accordance with OPZ requirements, including the provision of data recorded by the measurement system devices and data exchange with the Ordering Party's Regional Traffic Management System (RSZR). Maintenance activities include, among others: maintenance and continuous maintenance efficiency and proper technical condition of all elements constituting the measurement system, in particular the technical and software infrastructure, collecting recorded data and performing auxiliary activities, i.e. calibration and verification tests ensuring the achievement of required accuracy of data provided by stations. The maintenance of the measurement system also includes ensuring the collection, exchange and transmission of data to and from measurement stations, as well as all activities related to ensuring the proper functioning of individual station modules, including signs and variable message boards constituting part of the measuring station infrastructure. Maintaining the measurement system also includes repairs to the infrastructure and equipment of the measurement system necessary to maintain proper technical condition and ensure continuity deliver.... input: Country: Poland. Purchaser Name: NOWODWORSKI COUNTY. Summary: Modernization of District Road No. 2417 on the Zakrętym - nowe Trębki Section on a 670 M Long Section. Description: The subject of the order is the execution of road construction works, which will include the modernization of the district road No. 2417 on the route Zakrętym - Nowe Trbki in the town of Henrysin, in the Zakrętym commune, on a 670 m long section. The scope of work includes: preparatory works, milling correction of the road surface (up to 2 cm) along with removal and spreading of the reclaimed material in the place indicated by the Ordering Party, construction of 10 cm thick roadsides, execution of a leveling layer - more (5 cm) from mineral-bituminous mixtures, execution of a wearing course layer (5 cm) from mineral-bituminous mixtures, height regulation of exits, height regulation of intersections with service roads, cleaning of ditches with profiling and horizontal marking of the road with paint. The modernization will be carried out in the town of Zakrętym, in the Zakrętym commune. The final road surface will be made of mixtures mineral-bituminous 5.50 m wide. Cross-slope of the road - 2%, cross-slope of the roadsides - 6%. The intention of the investment is to strengthen the road structure and adjust the height of the remaining elements of the road system to the new road grade. .... Published Date: 2025-11-06. Closing Date: 2025-11-20. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

Description: The subject of the order is the creation and operation of a Selective Municipal Waste Collection Point (PSZOK) in the city of Gniezno or at a distance no more than 20 km from the administrative borders of the city of Gniezno and transferring it for management to the Waste Management Plant in Henbane. instruction: Extract and classify the tender information into structured fields such as TOT ID, Tender Notice No, Tender Value, Currency, CPV, Sector, Sub-Sector, and More Details link from the following tender text.
input: Country: Poland. Purchaser Name: UJŚCIE COMMUNE. Summary: Reconstruction of the Municipal Road at Ul. Węglewska in Kruszewo. Description: The works include the reconstruction of municipal road 130816P within the road to plot no. 199 (district 0004, unit 301907_5). The planned route begins at 0+140 meters and ends at 0+370 meters according to the construction design. The length of the road section intended for construction is 230.00 meters. All designed routes was incorporated as much as possible into its existing course, introducing only minor corrections aimed at improving the geometry of the existing road. The implementation includes three exits, two to the property and the third to the internal road. The width of the slopes is from 4.5 m to 5.5 m, according to the design. An extension has been designed of the existing road up to 5.50 m, along with 2 x 0.75 m wide shoulders on both sides. The works include profiling the existing road and hardening it with concrete cubes . 8 cm on a cement and sand ballast, thick. 5 cm, 5.5 m wide with 12x25 resistors and ground shoulders on both sides 75 cm wide. The surface of the designed road and exits should be made of concrete cubes with a thickness of 8 cm on a 5 cm thick cement and sand ballast. Substructure made of mechanically stabilized crushed aggregate, 0/31.5 mm thick, 15 cm thick, 20 cm thick on the widenings. Mildness.. Published Date: 2025-11-05. Closing Date: 2025-11-19. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

output.Summary: Reconstruction of the Municipal Road at Ul. Węglewska in Kruszewo
output.Description: The works include the reconstruction of municipal road 130816P within the road to plot no. 199 (district 0004, unit 301907_5). All designed routes was incorporated as much as possible into its existing course, introducing only minor corrections aimed at improving the geometry of the existing road. The implementation includes three exits, two to the property and the third to the internal road. The width of the slopes is from 4.5 m to 5.5 m, according to the design. An extension has been designed of the existing road up to 5.50 m, along with 2 x 0.75 m wide shoulders on both sides. The works include profiling the existing road and hardening it with concrete cubes . 8 cm on a cement and sand ballast, thick. 5 cm, 5.5 m wide with 12x25 resistors and ground shoulders on both sides 75 cm wide. The surface of the designed road and exits should be made of concrete cubes with a thickness of 8 cm on a 5 cm thick cement and sand ballast. input: Country: Poland. Purchaser Name: COMMUNE AND CITY OF NOWE SKALMIERZYCE. Summary: Management of Ash and Textile and Clothing Waste Collected from Property Owners Living in the Commune and City of nowe Skalmierzyce.. Description: The subject of the order is a service consisting in the management of ash from households (waste code ex 20 01 99), clothing and textile waste (waste code 20 01 10), from real estate residing in the Commune and City of Nowe Skalmierzyce subject to waste management fees municipal, delivered by an entity authorized to collect from residents, in a manner consistent with the regulations. During the order execution period, according to estimates, approximately 600 tons of ash, 50 tons of clothing and textiles were transferred for disposal. The properties from which the waste will be collected are located within the administrative boundaries of the Commune and City of Nowe Skalmierzyce. The service will take place over a period of 13 months. The place of acceptance of waste for disposal must be located in an area within 25 km from the registered office of the Ordering Party. A detailed Description of the Subject of the Order is attached to SWZ.. Published Date: 2025-11-05. Closing Date: 2025-11-13. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

input: Country: Poland. Purchaser Name: GENERAL DIRECTORATE FOR NATIONAL ROADS AND MOTORWAYS. Summary: Extension of National Road No. 60 on the Topola Krolewska - Kutno Section.. Description: The subject of the order is the extension of national road No. 60 on the 19.274 km section of Topola Krolewska - Kutno from km 0+000 to km 19+274 with the following parameters: GP class, load capacity 115 KN/axle, road width approximately 20 m, lane width 3.5, cross-section 2 x 3.5 m and 2 x 0.5 m as the hardened part of the lane road for maintenance purposes and 2 x 1.5 m width of roadsides), traffic category KR5. Due to the expansion, the gradeline will change. The task includes the construction of: two road viaducts at km 15+133 with a total length of 68.60 m and a width of 14.70 m and at km 15+435 with a length of 22.09 m and width 43.25 m, construction of a bridge with a total length of 13.10 m, total width of 11.45 m and the construction of a crossing for animals at km 16+032, 7.4 m long and 12.20 m wide. In addition, the scope of the investment includes the following: construction and reconstruction of 19 intersections, construction of pedestrian and bicycle paths, construction/reconstruction of 28 bus bays, construction of dirt roadsides, construction of a road drainage/rainwater drainage system, construction of traffic safety elements/devices, construction of power supply and cable ducting for traffic lights and its construction in 4 locations, construction of lighting road, construction of a service channel on the entire section of DK 60, reconstruction of 28 culverts, reconstruction of 240 exits.<br> Extension of national road No. 60 on the Topola Krolewska - Kutno section.<br> Doc Title: Extension of national road No. 60 on the Topola Krolewska - Kutno section.<br> Contract Type: works. Published Date: 2025-11-05. Closing Date: 2025-11-21. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

In addition, the scope of the investment includes the following: construction and reconstruction of 19 intersections, construction of pedestrian and bicycle paths, construction/reconstruction of 28 bus bays, construction of dirt roadsides, construction of a road drainage/rainwater drainage system, construction of traffic safety elements/devices, construction of power supply and cable ducting for traffic lights and its construction in 4 locations, construction of lighting road, construction of a service channel on the entire section of DK 60, reconstruction of 28 culverts, reconstruction of 240 exits.<br> Extension of national road No. 60 on the Topola Krolewska - Kutno section.<br> Doc Title: Extension of national road No. 60 on the Topola Krolewska - Kutno section.<br> Contract Type: works

instruction: Extract and classify the tender information into structured fields such as TOT ID, Tender Notice No, Tender Value, Currency, CPV, Sector, Sub-Sector, and More Details link from the following tender text.
input: Country: Poland. Purchaser Name: CAPITAL CITY OF WARSAW REMBERTOW DISTRICT. Summary: Renovation of the Street E. Bocheński "Dubaniec" in the Scope of Improving Traffic Safety in the Rembertow District of the Capital City of Warsaw. Description: The scope of the order is the renovation of Bocheskiego Dubaca Street to improve traffic safety by installing speed bumps. Each threshold will be 4.0 m long with a 10% slope per 1.0 m and will be made of dark gray rectangular concrete paving stones 20/10/8. The thresholds will remain framed with a concrete curb with dimensions 15/30/100 on a C12/15 concrete bench. The renovation also assumes the implementation of horizontal and vertical markings along the entire length of the street in accordance with permanent traffic organization (design collective).. Tender Value: 63873.61. Currency: PLN. Published Date: 2025-11-05. Closing Date: 2025-11-19. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

output.Purchaser_Name: CAPITAL CITY OF WARSAW REMBERTOW DISTRICT
output.Summary: Renovation of the Street E. Bocheński "Dubaniec" in the Scope of Improving Traffic Safety in the Rembertow District of the Capital City of Warsaw
output.Description: The scope of the order is the renovation of Bocheskiego Dubaca Street to improve traffic safety by installing speed bumps. Each threshold will be 4.0 m long with a 10% slope per 1.0 m and will be made of dark gray rectangular concrete paving stones 20/10/8. The thresholds will remain framed with a concrete curb with dimensions 15/30/100 on a C12/15 concrete bench. The renovation also assumes the implementation of horizontal and vertical markings along the entire length of the street in accordance with permanent traffic organization (design collective).

input: Country: Poland. Purchaser Name: SILESIAN UNIVERSITY OF TECHNOLOGY. Summary: Modernization of the Laboratory in Building "C" Gliwice, Ul. Towarowa 7, for the Adaptation of the Foundry Laboratory. Case Reference Number: Dzpz.284.68.2025.Al. Description: 1. The subject of the order are construction works including the modernization of building C at ul. Towarowa 7 in Gliwice for the needs of adaptation to a new laboratory. Scope of works in the architectural and construction industry: demolition works, replacement of the hardened surface, sealing of the technological duct, supplementation plasters and plasters, floor construction, wall and floor coverings, painting works, installation of internal door joinery and sectional gates. The scope of the electrical industry includes the modernization of: the internal power supply line, basic and emergency evacuation lighting, and the installation of sockets. 230V and 400V, computer installation, PWP fire protection circuit breaker installation, lightning protection installation, LAN and WLAN structured cabling installation and execution of electrical installation supplying sanitary installations and CCTV video monitoring installations; post-assembly tests. Sanitary installations include: installation of water supply, sewage, central heating, compressed air, mechanical ventilation and air conditioning. 2. Deadline for order completion: up to 4 months from the date of conclusion contracts.. Published Date: 2025-11-05. Closing Date: 2025-11-20. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

output.Summary: Modernization of the Laboratory in Building "C" Gliwice, Ul. Towarowa 7, for the Adaptation of the Foundry Laboratory. Case Reference Number: Dzpz.284.68.2025.Al

Sanitary installations include: installation of water supply, sewage, central heating, compressed air, mechanical ventilation and air conditioning. 2. Order names and codes according to the Common Procurement Vocabulary (CPV):90620000-9 - De-icing services90630000-2 - De-icing services3. The subject of the order includes comprehensive winter equipment road maintenance consisting in ensuring passability and limiting disruptions to the flow of road traffic caused by snowfall, sleet, freezing rain or slippery winter roads by removing snow, preventing the formation and elimination of winter slippery conditions, and removing snow from the streets if necessary city ​​after heavy snowfall and clearing the remains of winter road maintenance (sand) from the streets.4. The contractor is obliged to be on duty with an appropriate number of equipment and the operator, to keep logs of the duties and work of winter road maintenance equipment, and to present them at each the Ordering Party's request and submitting daily reports on the condition of the roads to the Ordering Party.
